loc.description: URL of the page (e.g. some/link). Sum of this value and baseURL must be less than 2,048 characters.

lastmod.description: The date of last modification of the page (e.g. 2023-12-08). This date should be in W3C Datetime format. This format allows you to omit the time portion, if desired, and use YYYY-MM-DD.

priority.description: The priority of this URL relative to other URLs on your site. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0.

changefreq.description: How frequently the page is likely to change.

callback.tsType: ((location: string) => string | ({loc: string; lastmod?: string; priority?: number; changefreq?: string}))

pattern.description: Specific pattern to filter the asset (e.g. .html), This can be string (glob pattern) or you can provide function instead of string pattern

baseURL.description: Root URL of your site (e.g. https://your.site)

urls.description: Optional array of locations on your site. These can be strings or you can provide object to customize each url.

emitted.description: Optional object to customize each url by webpack emitted assets

filename.description: Name of the sitemap file emitted to your build output

lastmod.description: The date for <lastmod> on all urls. Can be overridden by url-specific lastmod config. If value is true, the current date will be used for all urls.

priority.description: A <priority> to be set globally on all locations. Can be overridden by url-specific priorty config.

changefreq.description: A <changefreq> to be set globally on all locations. Can be overridden by url-specific changefreq config.
